sentences.en: 1998 was an important year for everyone: a time of change.
sentences.cn: 1998年对所有人来说都是重要的一年：那是个变革的时期。

sentences.en: By the time he's twenty he'll know everyone worth knowing in Washington.
sentences.cn: 到20岁时，他就会认识华盛顿所有值得认识的人。

sentences.en: Cars are driven through the mess, splashing everyone in range.
sentences.cn: 车从脏水里驶过，溅了周围所有人一身水。

sentences.en: Everyone is agreed that something needs to be done about the situation.
sentences.cn: 所有人一致认为需要采取措施改变这种局面。

sentences.en: Everyone knew that Muriel was destined for great things.
sentences.cn: 所有人都知道缪里尔命中注定要成就一番伟业。

sentences.en: Everyone wanted to bowl, hence everyone wanted to open a bowling alley.
sentences.cn: 大家都想玩保龄球，因此大家都想开保龄球馆。

sentences.en: He pushed everyone full speed ahead until production hit a bottleneck.
sentences.cn: 他催促所有人拼命干活，直到生产遭遇瓶颈。

sentences.en: If everyone is ready, I’ll begin.
sentences.cn: 如果大家都准备好了，我就开始。
并不是谁都喜欢体育运动的。

sentences.en: Not everyone in the world will be kind and caring towards you.
sentences.cn: 并非世上每个人都会对你友善关心。

sentences.en: Of course everyone else thought it was hilarious!
sentences.cn: 当然其他所有人都觉得好笑极了！

sentences.en: Send my best wishes to everyone in the family.
sentences.cn: 请向全家人致以最美好的祝愿。

sentences.en: The car was a write-off, but everyone escaped unharmed.
sentences.cn: 这辆车报废了，但人员全部安全逃离。

sentences.en: The computer is a leveller, making information available to everyone.
sentences.cn: 计算机是公平之物，所有人物都能从中获得信息。

sentences.en: The crime was so base that everyone wanted to hush it up.
sentences.cn: 这一罪行如此卑鄙无耻，大家都不想声张出去。

sentences.en: The war sweeps up everyone in hatred and recrimination.
sentences.cn: 战争让大家充满仇恨并相互指责。

sentences.en: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, many are stronger at the broken places.
sentences.cn: 生活总是让我们遍体鳞伤，但到后来，那些受伤的地方会变得更坚强。

sentences.en: Then the woodcutter let his axe fly— Thwack! Everyone heard it.
sentences.cn: 然后那个伐木工脱手甩出了斧头。哐！每个人都听见了。

sentences.en: They used to kiss and cuddle in front of everyone.
sentences.cn: 他们过去经常在人前搂抱亲吻。
